titleStmt.title: A sermon in confutation of R. H. the author of The guide in controversies Shewing that his most plausible arguments produced against Protestants, do more effectually conclude for Judaism against Christianity. By Daniel Whitby, D.D. chantor of the church of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Brome at the Gun in S. Pauls Church-Yard, R. Bentley and M. Magnes in Russelstreet Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Text is continuous despite pagination; register is not (p. 20 = B8v; p. 145 = 2K).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Gun in S. Pauls Church-Yard
